text: Adalberto Campos Fernandes (born 1958) is a Portuguese politician who served as Minister of Health from 26 November 2015 to 15 October 2018. Fernandes graduated with a PhD in health administration from the University of Lisbon and is a professor at the New University of Lisbon. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese politicians Category:Health ministers of Portugal Category:People from Lisbon
title: Adalberto Campos Fernandes
